#include <stdio.h>
long long int inline inp()
{
    long long int n=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c < '0' || c >'9') {c=getchar_unlocked();}
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
    n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0';
    c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return n;
}
int main()
{
	long long int t,n;
	t=inp();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=inp();
		if(n%2==0||n%3==0||n%6==0)
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
